name: Hell Yeah! (Batside and Lootwig)
description:
Not everything goes according to plan in life. Due to an unforeseen accident, Billybob finds himself in Hell- to the Devils surprise. Because this arrival doesn't fit his plans. So they start on an adventure to bring him back to where he belongs.

In this 2D-Plattformer, you take control over the Devil and Billybob. Billybob has to find a way to hell's exit, while the Devil is on the Overworld helping him.

Controls:

  • a/d = walk left/right
  • w = jump
  • e = use/ shoot
  • s = shoot down (only with Devil)

Requirements:

  • a PC
  • Keyboard

To play the game, simply download the files, unzip them, open the folder and run HellYeah.exe. To close it, just Alt+F4.

P.S.: There are no bugs, just features ^^.

Music by incompetech

https://incompetech.com/music/
